name: Manuel Bot
description: MANUEL-BOT  - Makes it easy and fun to use Whatsapp.

AQUA_SESSION.description: Codes received after scanning the Qr.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So your number must be followed by the country code. Example: 947xxxx

LANGUAGE.description: Bot Language.Specify SI for Sinhala Language.Specify EN for English Language

HANDLERS.description: When giving a command to the bot, you need to put the sign at the beginning

CUS_PANEL.description: It will add a command you need to get your menu. Apply a command you like.

DEPLOYER.description: Enter your name or a preferred name

SEND_READ.description: Set bot message to true if required and false if not required.

C_EMOJI.description: It changes the emoji before the command in your menu...apply an emoji of your choice.

D_EMOJI.description: It will change the emoji before the description in your menu...apply an emoji of your choice.

DETAILS.description: If you want to see the details of songs, videos and photos, set it to true, otherwise set it to false..

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: When a group is muted, the message should come. If you want to put the set message, leave it as default.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Need to give the bot not working chat. Ex: 94######### or 94#########,94#########

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: When unmuting a group, the message should come. If you want to put the set message, leave it as default.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: The message that comes when blocked.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: The message that comes when unblocking

SONG_DOWN.description: Changing the message received while downloading songs!... This is not essential

SONG_UP.description: Changing the message when uploading songs!... This is not essential

VIDEO_DOWN.description: Changing the message received when downloading videos!... This is not essential

VIDEO_UP.description: Changing the video upload message!... This is not essential

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Go to https://remove.bg and provide the API key to remove the background of images.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: https://dashboard.heroku.com/account Click this link. Scroll down for API key. Then click the Reveal button. Copy that API key and paste the blank box below.y.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Select the chat where the bot is not working. Ex: 947xxxxxxxxx && 947xxxxxxxxx or 947xxxxxxxxx,947xxxxxxxxx

WORK_TYPE.description: The way the bot works. If you use â€œpublicâ€, everyone can use the bot. If you use â€œprivateâ€, only you can use your bot.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: The message received when checking whether the bot is online or not. It is not necessary to change this.

ALIVE_LOGO.description: Mention your image link below to change the Alive message image. (Upload the image you want on https://imgbb.com website and paste the link here.)

BAN_MESSAGE.description: The message should come when someone is removed from a group through the bot

ADD_MESSAGE.description: When someone is added to a group through the bot, the message should come.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: The message should come when leaving a group through the bot

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: The message should come when you admin a group to someone via bot

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: The message should come when someone removes the admin of a group through the bot

AFK_MESSAGE.description: AFK mode While there, the message should come

NO_ONLINE.description: If you want the bot to say online when it comes to WhatsApp, set it to true, otherwise set it to false

CAPTION.description: caption The message to put together

FOOTER.description: Footer text The message to put together

COFFEEHOUSE_.description: Give it up. We give you this.

ALIVE_STIC.description: direct webp Apply a link. Or leave it as default. After the bot is activated, it can be changed through WhatsApp..

IMGBB.description: imgbb.com Go together and log in and apply the apikey here.
